steps.title: Problem Identification
steps.desc:
I begin every project by observing on-site workflows and identifying stakeholders' pain points.
I document inefficiencies in data, processes, and user experience to clearly define:
"Exactly what problem needs to be solved?"

steps.title: Hypothesis & Structuring
steps.desc:
Rather than simply listing problems,
I reinterpret them through a cause-process-outcome framework to create testable hypotheses.
At this stage, I integrate clinical insights, data patterns, and operational constraints
to set realistic directions and goals.

steps.title: Solution Design & Execution
steps.desc:
Based on project objectives, I design integrated solutions including:

• Clinical trial operations and data flow architecture
• User experience-focused digital interfaces
• AI/automation model design and implementation
• Organizational collaboration and communication workflows
• Process optimization and error prevention systems

The key is creating structures that actually work in real-world settings,
not just theoretical ideas.

steps.title: Impact Validation
steps.desc:
I validate solution effectiveness through data-driven evaluation and derive improvements based on quantitative and qualitative assessments.

• Statistics and metrics-based analysis
• User, patient, and clinician feedback
• Process stability evaluation
• Reproducibility and scalability review

The goal is not just to "complete" a project,
but to create lasting value for the organization.

about.title: Philosophy & Approach
about.description1: I believe the future of healthcare lies at the intersection of rigorous clinical validation and adaptive AI. With a background in nursing and clinical research, I ensure new technologies are not only cutting-edge but also clinically meaningful and patient-centered.
about.description2: Currently working as a Clinical Research Coordinator at International St. Mary's Hospital, designing strategies to accelerate drug development and improve patient outcomes through digital biomarkers and decentralized clinical trial methodologies.
